pr_title: validator committee indexes need to be returned as string.

timeline.message:
validator committee indexes need to be returned as string.

returning as integers resulted in a failed eth2-comply test.

Signed-off-by: Paul Harris <paul.harris@consensys.net>

timeline.bodyText: nit: This is feeling like a common util method we're likely to wind up using in a few places converting from List to List.
timeline.author: ajsutton

replies.bodyText: True, I'd be surprised if we don't have this written in a bunch of places...
replies.author: rolfyone
